description: This file defines a layout component for a web application using the Qwik framework. It includes imports, a server-side cache control handler, a server data loader, and a component that renders a header, footer, and slot for nested content.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles GET requests, setting cache control headers for performance optimization.

methods.name: useServerTimeLoader
methods.description: Loads the current server time, formatted as ISO string, for use in the component.
